tr.td: Accident and emergency or dental casualty department of the Health Care Provider
NHS other Hospital Provider - Ward for general Patients or the younger physically disabled or A and E department
No known drug allergies or adverse reactions

td.p: Brought to the hospital A+E department by the police as had been involved in a disturbance in a shopping centre, assaulting another customer.
Agitated on interview and denying any thoughts of self-harm.
Well known to local mental health services.

tr.th: Treatments and interventions and changes made to treatments

td.p: Tested negative for banned substances following admission.
Diagnosis of Paranoid Schizophrenia, frequently uncompliant with treatment.
Due to poor adherence with treatment she was discharged from hospital subject to a Community Treatment Order and is, therefore, subject to recall to hospital if she does not adhere to treatment.

tr.td: Patient discharged on clinical advice or with clinical consent
Discharge address: 27, Grove Street, Leeds, LS21 4GG
MGP Medical Centre, 1 MGP House, Overtown, Leeds, LS21 7PA
No special requirements, but states that her daughter should be contacted in an emergency.
Patient warned that she is subject to recall to hospital if she does not adhere to treatment.

Dose directions description: Take three 2mg tablets daily for 7 days

td.p: Physical attention will be needed from Primary Care due to the fact she is on an atypical antipsychotic and will need weight and general health monitoring by the Community Consultant/Team:Dr Gillingham Leeds Recovery and Support Team.

tr.th: Actions for patient or their carer
Agreed with patient or legitimate patient representative

tr.td:
CPA Status and 117 Aftercare: Follow up will be made by the Leeds Recovery and Support team. 7 Day Follow up will be done by the community team.
Status: Requested
Dr. Daniel Beck, Consultant, Leeds Mental Health NHS Trust
Can be abusive and agitated when non compliant with treatment
Frequently uncompliant with treatment and during these times often misuses alcohol and cannabis.
